p: Corrigendum to Council Decision (EU) 2019/1355 of 15 July 2019 on the position to be taken on behalf of the European Union in the EPA Committee established under the stepping stone Economic Partnership Agreement between Côte d'Ivoire, of the one part, and the European Community and its Member States, of the other part, as regards the adoption of Protocol 1 concerning the definition of the concept of 'originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation
(Official Journal of the European Union L 222 of 26 August 2019)
On page 18, the Annex to the draft decision of the EPA committee, Protocol 1, in Article 17(1) and (2):

content.p: Products originating in the European Union shall, on importation into Côte d'Ivoire, benefit from the Agreement upon the submission of an origin declaration, in the cases specified in Article 22(1) of this Protocol …
Products originating in Côte d'Ivoire shall …:

point.p: in the cases specified in Article 22(1) of this Protocol …',

content.p: Products originating in the European Union shall, on importation into Côte d'Ivoire, benefit from the Agreement upon the submission of an origin declaration, in the cases specified in Article 21(1) of this Protocol …
Products originating in Côte d'Ivoire shall …:

point.p: in the cases specified in Article 21(1) of this Protocol …'.

p: On page 24, the Annex to the draft decision of the EPA committee, Protocol 1, in Article 31(1) to (2):

content.p: 1. For the application of Article 21(1)(b) and Article 26(3) of this Protocol in cases where products are invoiced in a currency other than euro …
A consignment shall benefit from the provisions of Article 22(1)(b) or Article 27(3) of this Protocol by reference to the currency in which the invoice is drawn up …',
For the application of Article 21(1)(c) and Article 26(3) of this Protocol in cases where products are invoiced in a currency other than euro …
A consignment shall benefit from the provisions of Article 21(1)(c) or Article 26(3) of this Protocol by reference to the currency in which the invoice is drawn up …'.
